articles.caption: A look at Tencent gaming international Q3 rev increasing but domestic earnings fall.  Int'l Q3 Rev = $1.65B
articles.title: The Block: Tencent international gaming revenue increases while domestic earnings fall
articles.description: The world's largest gaming company, Tencent saw a 3% increase in its international gaming revenue to $1.65 billion this quarter as domestic Chinese revenues dropped 7% following two years of tech industry crackdowns.
